# Star Wars Trading Cards Collection - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a React.js SPA for collecting Star Wars digital trading cards using the SWAPI (Star Wars API). The application implements an album system with envelope mechanics and cooldown timers.

## Technology Stack
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- React Router for navigation
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Local Storage for persistence

## Key Features
1. Digital album with 3 sections: Movies (6), Characters (82), Ships (36)
2. Envelope opening system with 1-minute cooldowns
3. Special vs Regular cards classification
4. Random card generation from SWAPI
5. Local storage persistence

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper error handling for API calls
- Follow React best practices (hooks, context)
- Maintain responsive design
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility features
